jump_scares.spoiler: The mannequin on the floor springs up as the man touches it
A mannequin suddenly crashes through the window
The man opens a door, and a cackling mannequin jumps out at him from inside
The mirror suddenly smashes by itself
The curtain suddenly flies up by itself
There is a sudden cut to a creepy mannequin sitting on a chair with a loud sound cue
The mannequin opens its arms and springs forward towards the camera
The killer steps in front of Molly from the side accompanied by a sound cue
